title: Spin Art by StefanAI
instructions: Arrow keys control rotation (Tap: change speed, Hold: Max-Speed)
shift_text: Hold Shift and click two points to connect them with a line.
mobile_warning_text: This app is designed for desktop use with keyboard and mouse. Controls and layout might not work as expected on touchscreens.
tooltip_pressure: Stroke width responds to Apple Pencil pressure. Light pressure = thinner line.
tooltip_eraser: Switch to eraser mode. Removes drawn areas.
tooltip_physics: Simulates centrifugal force. Paint flies outward during rotation.
tooltip_line: Click two points consecutively to connect them with a straight line.
tooltip_outline: Draws only the outline of the shape without fill.
tooltip_gradient: Color automatically changes from start to end color while drawing.
tooltip_symmetry: Mirrors drawing radially around the center. Perfect for mandalas.
